Description:
Saves the state of the table to enable loading the campaign into a new save and keep all current progress.

This tool will track which campaign you're playing, the entire contents of your campaign log, the contents of your chaos bag, update your health/sanity according to trauma, your ArkhamDB deck IDs, the number of investigators, the page of your campaign guide, and any options you have selected in the options panel.

For saving trauma values to correct seats, ensure investigators in the campaign log are in the following order: White, Orange, Green, Red

(For custom campaigns, ensure: 1) Campaign Box, Campaign Log, and Campaign Guide each have the corresponding tag, 2)The Campaign Box is on the table when you import or export.
Name: Custom_Tile
